name: Rashōmon
description:
A short mood vignette/love letter to Kurosawa.

See a story framed through three perspectives and attempt to piece together the true version of events.

This game was made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 in two days, I intend to come back and update the game closer to the intended idea! More at St. Vulture

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to interact/progress
